content.description: An absolute stunner.  Squat start low on the crazy steep arete. Left hand side pull crimp, right hand shallow pocket side pull. Awkward moves to the first jug.  Work your way up on jugs and slopers using heel-hooks and other trickery until you reach the apex of the cave roof at ~15ft off the ground. Here is where the problem merges with Masterpiece and you enter the crux of Renaissance.  Desperately hard crimping ensues until you can mantle onto the slab.  Take a deep and continue up the 45ft V0 slab to the topout.
content.protection: As many pads as you can get there
content.location: The route is easily seen from the road; a severely overhanging black arete with white chalked holds heading up it. A 15 minute hike.
